tips.title: Master the Controls
tips.description: Use arrow keys or WASD to control your sleigh. Lean into turns and use the brake wisely to maintain control on icy surfaces.

tips.title: Collect Gifts
tips.description: Gather presents along the track to earn points and unlock special abilities. Some gifts contain power-ups that can help you race faster.

tips.title: Beat the Clock
tips.description: Complete tracks within the time limit to unlock new levels. Practice makes perfect - learn the optimal racing lines.

tips.title: Avoid Obstacles
tips.description: Watch out for trees, rocks, and other obstacles. Use your sleigh's agility to navigate through tight spaces safely.

tips.title: Use Power-ups
tips.description: Activate speed boosts, shields, and other power-ups strategically to gain an advantage over your competitors.

tips.title: Compete for Records
tips.description: Try to beat your best times and compete with friends for the fastest lap records on each track.
